situational-awareness.name: Situational Awareness
situational-awareness.description: Build and maintain situational awareness in dynamic operational environments. Master perception, comprehension, projection, attention management, and threat recognition to stay ahead of changing conditions.

decision-making.name: Decision Making
decision-making.description: Operational decision-making under pressure, uncertainty, and time constraints. Master decision models, recognize cognitive biases, and improve team decision processes.

communication.name: Communication
communication.description: Verbal and non-verbal communication in operational environments. Master briefings, active listening, assertiveness, conflict resolution, and digital communication.

teamwork.name: Teamwork
teamwork.description: Team dynamics, coordination, trust-building, and performance optimization. Learn to leverage diversity, build psychological safety, and excel in distributed teams.

leadership.name: Leadership
leadership.description: Leadership skills for high-reliability operations. Develop decision authority, influence, people development capabilities, crisis management, and ethical leadership.

human-factors.name: Human Factors
human-factors.description: Human performance limitations, fatigue, stress, environmental factors, human-machine interfaces, and organizational influences on safety.

hf-offshore.name: Human Factors for Offshore Drilling Operations
hf-offshore.description: Advanced human factors for offshore drilling operations. Master HF integration in MODU design, control room environments, barrier management, offshore work organization, and UK safety case compliance.
